text: Erythrophysa transvaalensis (Bushveld red balloon, , ) is a species of plant in the family family Sapindaceae. It is a protected tree in South Africa. It is found in Botswana, South Africa, and Zimbabwe. Its range is disjunct however, so that suggestions have been made that its seeds were formerly employed as beads, which assisted its dispersal along ancient trade routes. ==References== transvaalensis Category:Trees of Botswana Category:Flora of Zimbabwe Category:Protected trees of South Africa Category:Least concern plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Erythrophysa transvaalensis
